abstract: A lawyer for Toyota argued that the driver, not electronics or the floor mat, was responsible when a 2005 Toyota Scion accelerated out of control and hit a tree.
snippet: A lawyer for Toyota argued that the driver, not electronics or the floor mat, was responsible when a 2005 Toyota Scion accelerated out of control and hit a tree.
lead_paragraph: A federal jury in New York on Friday cleared the Toyota Motor Corporation in a civil lawsuit of accusations about unintended acceleration.

headline.main: Jurors Side With Toyota in Lawsuit Over Crash
headline.print_headline: Jurors Side With Toyota In Lawsuit Over Crash
